ai.summary: A short coastal stroll of about 1 km from Minn beach to Virda in the UK. An easy route suitable for beginners, mainly along beach terrain with occasional firm ground.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily sandy beach with potential soft sand and damp sections. Occasional firm patches, pebbles, and some exposed rocks near the shoreline. Tidal conditions may affect access at certain times.
ai.safety_notes: Be mindful of tides and weather. Watch for soft sand and sudden water on the shore. Stay away from cliff edges and unstable banks. Inform someone of your plans and carry a charged phone.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) offer most pleasant conditions; hiking is possible year-round with proper clothing and gear.

seo.title: Minn beach to Virda – 1 km Easy Coastal Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Enjoy a 1 km easy coastal hike from Minn beach to Virda in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, the best seasons, and what to pack for this short seaside walk.
